condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: National social protection system effectively targets the most vulnerable and excluded children.

description.narrative: UNICEF's stakeholder engagement and high-level policy advocacy efforts resulted in Government agreement to design and test Botswana's first Child Support Grant (CSG), as seen recommended by within the mid-term review framework of the current National Development Plan 11 | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: A costed plan of actions for the introducation of the Child Support Grant is available

Information and reports on child-focused public expenditures (by sector and sub-sector) is available by governments; sectors are health, nutrition, child protection, social protection, WASH and education
